it.polimi.se2019.client.cli

Class CLIUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.client.cli.CLIUtil

  • public class CLIUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    The cli util is a bit more than just a util file, it also manages the console. Then it provides useful methods to make life easier.
    Author:
    FF

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CLIUtil()
      The constructor loads settings from file

      java.lang.String askUserInput(java.lang.String question)
      This is one of the many ways to ask the user a question, here you just provide a question
      java.lang.String askUserInput(java.lang.String question, java.util.List<java.lang.String> validResponses, java.lang.Boolean numbered)
      This is one of the many ways to ask the user a question, here you just provide a question and the valid responses to choose from, the print layout can be numbered or not.
      java.lang.String askUserInput(java.lang.String question, java.lang.String defaultResponse)
      This is one of the many ways to ask the user a question, here you just provide a question and a default answer that is convenient for the user

      • askUserInput

        public java.lang.String askUserInput(java.lang.String question,
                                     java.util.List<java.lang.String> validResponses,
                                     java.lang.Boolean numbered)
        This is one of the many ways to ask the user a question, here you just provide a question and the valid responses to choose from, the print layout can be numbered or not.
        Parameters:
        question - the question to ask
        validResponses - the responses to choose from
        numbered - the layout style
        Returns:
        the answer of the user

      • askUserInput

                                     java.lang.String defaultResponse,
                                     java.util.List<java.lang.String> validResponses,
                                     java.lang.Boolean numbered)

        defaultResponse - the default response
        validResponses - the responses to choose from

      • canReload

        public java.lang.Boolean canReload(java.util.List<AmmoColor> reloadCost,
                                   java.util.Map<AmmoColor,java.lang.Integer> ammoBag,
                                   java.util.List<PowerUp> powerUpBag)
        This is an helper to check if a user can reload
        Parameters:
        reloadCost - the cost to reload
        ammoBag - the ammo I have
        powerUpBag - the powerups I have ( to be used as ammo)
        Returns:
        yes or no
